Summary._: Southbound [4] and [5] trains are delayed because of a signal problem at Fulton St.

Description._: Southbound 4 and 5 trains are delayed because of a signal problem at Fulton St.

LongDescription:
There is reduced southbound [4] and [5] train service while our crews work on a signal problem at Fulton St.

The last stop on some southbound [4] trains will be 149 St-Grand Concourse.

Some southbound [5] trains are running on the [2] line from 149 St-Grand Concourse to Nevins St.

Expect delays in [2] [3] [4] and [5] train service.

Summary._: There are service changes and delays in [C] and [E] train service while we get medical assistance for someone at W 4 St-Washington Sq. Details at mta.info

Description._: There are service changes and delays in C and E train service while we get medical assistance for someone at W 4 St-Washington Sq. Details at mta.info

LongDescription:
There are service changes and delays in [C] and [E] train service while we get medical assistance for someone at W 4 St-Washington Sq.

168 St-bound [C] trains are running on the express track from Canal St to 59 St-Columbus Circle.

Jamaica-bound [E] trains are running on the express track from Canal St to 42 St-Port Authority Bus Terminal.

Expect delays in [A][C] and [E] train service.

Summary._: Church Av-bound [G] trains are proceeding after we moved a train with door problems at Bedford-Nostrand Avs.

Description._: Church Av-bound G trains are proceeding after we moved a train with door problems at Bedford-Nostrand Avs.

LongDescription: Church Av-bound [G] trains are proceeding after we moved a train with door problems at Bedford-Nostrand Avs.
